plugins.name: specsmith
plugins.description: Create and manage thorough implementation specs with discovery interviews, deep research, and phased execution. Commands: /specsmith-new, /specsmith-implement, /specsmith-resume, /specsmith-switch, /specsmith-edit, /specsmith-status, /specsmith-list, /specsmith-show, /specsmith-archive, /specsmith-unarchive, /specsmith-drop.

plugins.name: uispec-backend
plugins.description: Backend plugin for maintaining UI specifications. Syncs openapi.yaml, endpoint specs, and component patterns after API changes. Commands: /uispec-init, /uispec-sync, /uispec-validate.

plugins.name: uispec-frontend
plugins.description: Frontend plugin for consuming UI specifications. Reads specs from uispec/ to guide component development, enforce API contracts, and maintain design system consistency. Commands: /uispec-detect, /uispec-implement, /uispec-validate-ui.

plugins.name: runebook
plugins.description: Living documentation for how your application works. Maintains structured docs for endpoints, jobs, flows, services, and integrations â€” always in sync with code. Commands: /runebook-init, /runebook-update, /runebook-validate, /runebook-show, /runebook-status.

plugins.name: grimoire
plugins.description: Research suite with 6 specialized agents for documentation lookup, best practices, codebase analysis, git history, DB schema analysis, and API contract review. Command: /grimoire.

plugins.name: chisel
plugins.description: Fast surgical code editor for renaming files/variables/classes, moving files, find-and-replace, and small targeted edits across any language. Automatically updates all references and imports. Command: /chisel.
